attributes.action: make the telling of blatent untruths in parliament a criminal offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
im sure everyone is sick of hearing MP's telling blatent untruths(lies) and seemingly allowed by broadcasters to get away with it. well its about time they are held accountable, so when they spin figures that are totally untrue they are charged the same as if someone told lies in court. ie perjury. this parliamentry privelage that allows them to tell these lies is obscene.
and it may just allow respect to come back to polotics

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
